history.action: üîç DELIVERED CLI Integration Tests (PR #36) ‚Äî 22 new integration tests for `ada init` (12 tests) and `ada status` (10 tests). üé® DELIVERED CLI UX Audit (Issue #38) ‚Äî comprehensive design review of ada status and ada init before v1.0-alpha. 5 polish items: duplicate emoji in history, truncation mid-word, fragile stats extraction, verbose history defaults, init help redundancy. P2 for launch.

üëî DELIVERED Go/No-Go Decision Framework (docs/business/go-no-go-criteria.md) ‚Äî concrete rubric for Feb 17 launch decision. 6 MUST criteria, 4 SHOULD criteria, decision matrix, current assessment (3/6 MUST confirmed, 85% confidence for GO). Updated Issue #26 with framework and checklist.

üî¨ DELIVERED Competitive Landscape Analysis (docs/research/competitive-landscape-analysis.md) ‚Äî comprehensive market analysis covering Devin, OpenHands, SWE-Agent, Claude Code, CrewAI. 5 key differentiators identified: multi-agent team simulation, persistent shared memory, self-dogfooding, role evolution, open-source CLI.
